modName: illy's ENB - for NLVA and ELFX
summary:
I've decided to upload a final update for Illy's ENB. This is the NLVA version, which looks so much better than than the previous preset.
- Corrected some mistakes I've made with ambient light
- High quality reflections have been added
- Ambient Occlusion now really brings depth to the image.
- Colors are less blue and green-is
descriptionHtml:
I've decided to upload a final update for Illy's ENB. This is the NLVA version which looks so much better than the previous preset.





     [size=4] C H A N G E S   A N D   F E A T U R E S[/size]
       _______________
       _______________

      - Corrected some mistakes I've made with ambient light
      - High quality reflections are now visible on shiny objects like metals, armor, weapons and so on. 
      - Detailed use of SSAO. Now it really brings depth.
      - Colors are more neutral but is still has the orignal feeling of my previous preset.
      - Designed to work (ONLY) with NLVA and ELFX
      - A more performance friendly Depth of Field shader
      - The brightness of the sky has been decreased for more detail.
      - Better Sky Colors
      - Improved subsurface scattering

      - Please PM me if you see a bug or something you want to see improved.


       [size=4]R E Q U I E R E D   FILES[/size]
       ___________________________
       ___________________________
 

       [url=http://www.dev-c.com/skyrim/enbhelper/]ENB Helper[/url]﻿ - It's not allowed to include this file in my preset. Most ENB authors do it anyway, but I don't want any problems. You have to drop the enbhelper.dll inside the enbseries folder.
       [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75346/]Natural Lighting Vivid Atmospherics (NLVA)[/url]﻿
       [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/]Enhanced Lights and FX (ELFX)[/url] - ONLY select the ELFX ENHANCER. Do NOT select ELFX WEATHERS. ﻿
      

       [size=4]I N S T A L L A T I O N[/size]
       _______________________
       _______________________

      -Make sure all weather or lighting mods are disabled.
      -Download and install the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75346/]NLVA[/url]﻿ and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/]ELFX[/url] main files.﻿ 
      -Download the latest ENB binaries. The download button is the black arrow at the bottom of the page.
      -In the wrapper version, copy the d3d9.dll and the enbhost.exe. Paste these files in the Skyrim folder.
      -Download my preset. Copy the enbseries.ini, enblocal.ini and the enbseries folder and paste these in the Skyrim folder.

      Enblocal.ini
      [MEMORY]
      ExpandSystemMemoryX64=true           // When your Skyrim crashes to desktop on the main menu, set this to false. It worked for me!
      ReduceSystemMemoryUsage=true
      DisableDriverMemoryManager=false    // If you have an AMD Graphics card, set this to true.
      DisablePreloadToVram=false
      EnableUnsafeMemoryHacks=false
      ReservedMemorySizeMB=512               // 1GB = 128  -  2GB = 256  -   4GB = 512   -   8 GB = 1024.
      VideoMemorySizeMB=(Depends on your system)
      // People with less than 8GB: VRAM + RAM - 2048. The highest value you can set this at is 10240
      // People with more than 8GB: VRAM + RAM - 2048 / 2. The highest value you can set this at is 10240
      EnableCompression=true                     // Set this to false if you experience stuttering.
      AutodetectVideoMemorySize=false





  Skyrimprefs.ini
  [Display]
  bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
  bTreesRecieveShadows=1
  bDrawLandShadows=1
  bShadowsOnGrass=1
  bDrawShadows=1
  fGamma=1.0000
  iMultiSample=0
  iMaxAnisotrophy=1
  fLightLODStartFade=8.000.0000
  fInteriorShadowDistance=8000.0000

  Skyrim.ini
  [General]
  sFlickeringLightDistance=8192


  [size=4]C O M P A T I B I L I T Y[/size]
  _________________________
  _________________________

 
  This preset is NOT compatible with any lighting or weather mods.


  [size=4]R E C O M M E N D E D   M O D S[/size]
  _______________________________
  _______________________________

  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]Realistic Water Two + ENB files [/url]                   >>> I highly recommend using this mod. It makes the water look very realistic.
  [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48938/]Watercolor for ENB & Realistic Water Two[/url] >>> It changes the watercolor and adds sunscattering. Highly recommended mod!
  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58443/?]SkySight Skins for Male[/url]                                  >>> This is a HD retexture for males, looks amazing combined with this ENB preset.
  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Calientes Beautiful Bodies for Female[/url]         >>> This is a HD retexture for females, looks great.
  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45807/?]Noble Skyrim HD[/url]                                               >>> A huge HD retexture for the architecture and landscapes of Skyrim.
  [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80157/]Skyland[/url]﻿                                                                >>> This is my personal favourite landscape retexture.


[size=4] V I D E O S[/size]

  _______________________________
